pullRequest.title: HDDS-3863. Provide script to re-generate Kubernetes resources files
pullRequest.bodyText:
What changes were proposed in this pull request?
Kubernetes resource files under hadoop-ozone/dist/src/main/k8s/examples generated from hadoop-ozone/dist/src/main/k8s/definitions. To make it easy to regenerate all the files (and test PRs) I would provide a shell script which calls the generator tool in each of the subdirectories.
What is the link to the Apache JIRA
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDDS-3863
How was this patch tested?
Execute the shell script.

commit.message: HDDS-3863. Provide script to re-generate Kubernetes resources files

nodes.bodyText:
On macosx, the find command is minor different with Linux, so is there another tool can replace find?
✗ find
usage: find [-H | -L | -P] [-EXdsx] [-f path] path ... [expression]
       find [-H | -L | -P] [-EXdsx] -f path [path ...] [expression]

➜  goofys git:(master) ✗ find . -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d -printf '%f\n'
find: -printf: unknown primary or operator
➜  goofys git:(master) ✗ find . -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d
./bench
./test
./example
./internal
./api
./doc
./.git
./vendor
./.idea
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,29 @@
+#!/usr/bin/env bash
+# Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one
+# or more contributor license agreements.  See the NOTICE file
+# distributed with this work for additional information
+# regarding copyright ownership.  The ASF licenses this file
+# to you under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the
+# "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance
+# with the License.  You may obtain a copy of the License at
+#
+#     http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+#
+# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+# limitations under the License.
+set -e
+
+if [ ! -x "$(command -v flekszible)" ]; then
+    echo "flekszible tool is required for regenerating Kubernetes files"
+    exit 1
+fi
+
+SCRIPT_DIR=$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" >/dev/null && pwd )
+cd "$SCRIPT_DIR"
+for dir in $(find . -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 -type d -printf '%f\n'); do

commit.message: make file fine loop osx compatible
